AutoVariable.label: Enable RSP
AutoVariable.tooltip: Enables steam rich presences in friends list

AutoVariable.label: Override Menu
AutoVariable.tooltip: Overrides default match state even in main menu

AutoVariable.label: Custom String
AutoVariable.tooltip: Changes map state to a custom value

AutoVariable.label: Party Size
AutoVariable.tooltip: Changes total party size in friends list

LabeledObject.label: Match State
LabeledObject.tooltip: Changes the game state in friends list
